about_the_game:
Welcome to Millennium Arcade!

Embark on a journey through the memory of a millennial in this arcade platform full of small indie games inspired by the golden age of entertainment.

Masters of the Void

A scifi multiplayer shooter where you fly between multiple ships to capture objective points.
Fly to the battleship for FPS action, or battle it out in space!

Customizable Appearance

Modify your appearance to your heart's content!

Future Games

  • Akui No Kin
    An isometric roguelike where you cleanse humanoid and animal monsters consumed by greed.

  • Pompeii '72
    Pompeii has exploded! Go NOW!Drive across lava flows to safety!

  • LarperZ
    A zombie survival game about the time there was a zombie outbreak when you when Larping!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Millennium Arcade!

Embark on a journey through the memory of a millennial in this arcade platform full of small indie games inspired by the golden age of entertainment.

Masters of the Void

A scifi multiplayer shooter where you fly between multiple ships to capture objective points.
Fly to the battleship for FPS action, or battle it out in space!

Customizable Appearance

Modify your appearance to your heart's content!

Future Games

  • Akui No Kin
    An isometric roguelike where you cleanse humanoid and animal monsters consumed by greed.

  • Pompeii '72
    Pompeii has exploded! Go NOW!Drive across lava flows to safety!

  • LarperZ
    A zombie survival game about the time there was a zombie outbreak when you when Larping!

name: Millennium Arcade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 8.1
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
